title: Quick guide for new users---ETC Tools
content:
Located on the left side corner of the ETC site is the site Menu. Mouse-over the menu to see the utilities and tools provided on the site.

All the tools require input files in a certain format. The general steps for running each of the tools include:



1. Start a tool in one of the two ways:
  • Click on a green Begin ... button on the homepage.

      • 2. Read the INPUT REQUIREMENTS for the tool and create, upload or select appropriate input files (input files for Text Capture maybe created using Create Input button in File Manager).
      3. Follow the instructions (on screen or in Help menu) to complete the necessary steps. Your progress is shown on the top of the screen.
      4. The final step informs the user the location of output files if any is generated. Take note of the file location, then go to File Manager to retrieve or download the output.

title: Quick guide for new time users---ETC Utilities
content:
Located on the left side corner of the ETC site is the site Menu. Mouse-over it to see the utilities and tools provided on the site.

Utilities include:



1. File Manager enables the user to upload, download, edit, or delete user-uploaded or system-generated files.
2. Task Manager shows the active jobs a user started and job status. The user can share or delete a job there. .
3. My Account allows user to change account information, set email notification, and set connection with other resources, such as OTO.
